charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_010:
While out exploring, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
stumbled across a road [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] hadn’t seen before.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_020:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] decided to follow the road
to see where it led...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_030:
Eventually, the road led [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to
a beautiful, sandy beach.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_040:
Then, just as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
about to settle down and take a little break...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_070:
I guess my secret beach isn’t much of a
secret anymore!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_090: Nope! Me and my Palossand came here to play!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_110: Uh-huh! Me and my Palossand came here to play!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_120:
Nobody really knows about this place, so it’s
always nice and quiet and perfect for relaxing!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_130:
Palossand seems to really love it here, too!
Sometimes she even comes here to play
all on her own!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0301_140: And then you follow her here?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_150:
Yep! That’s right!
’Cause I love this beach, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_160: Sounds like you two are best friends!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_180:
And Palossand always does her very, very best
for me, you know?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_190:
And she’s super strong! I can always depend on
her in a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_200: She listens to my commands really well...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_210:
and even when she doesn’t, she still
fights hard in her own way.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_220:
That’s why I always ask for Palossand’s
help when I know I have a tough battle
ahead of me.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_240:
I know, right?! I depend on her a lot,
even when we’re not in a battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_260:
I know, right?! I depend on her a lot,
even when we’re not in a battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_270: Back in Alola, where I’m from...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_280: she even looks after little kids and Pokémon, too.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_290:
We live at a place called Aether House—
there are always plenty of tiny tots
and Pokémon running around!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_300:
It makes me so happy that Palossand
always does her very best for me...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_310:
So whenever Palossand wants to play,
I always let her play a whole bunch!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_330:
Yeah! Actually, I’m really hoping that
you and I can become even better
friends, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_340: I could learn a lot from you.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_350:
Well, actually, I’m really hoping that
you and I can become even better
friends, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_360:
It was so nice of you to let us join your team—
it really means a lot to me!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_370:
I think of you as a really close friend.
And when we battle together, it’s so fun!
And neither of us holds anything back!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_380:
From now on, I’m gonna try to take on
an even more active role on the team
and help you out where I can!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0301_390: Thank you! I really appreciate that!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_400: Tee-hee! Aw, now I’m a little embarrassed!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_410: I can always count on you, Acerola!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_420: Tee-hee! Ahh, now I’m a little embarrassed!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_440:
Where did Palossand go?
She was right here just a second ago!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_450:
Oh! I think I see her playing over there!
Let’s go see what she’s up to.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_460:
Aha! I thought Palossand was just playing
around in the sand, but look at all these
shells! I think she’s collecting them!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_470:
Hey! Do you wanna collect some
shells with Palossand, too?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_480:
We should all compete to see who can
find the prettiest shell!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_500:
OK! Let’s do it!
Betcha I’ll find the prettiest one!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_510: You’re on! You can’t beat me!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_520:
All right!
Betcha I’ll find the prettiest one!
